mods.abstract: RUNAWAY FROM the residence of the undersigned, in Prairie Basse, near Grand Coteau, on Sunday night last, 22d instant, a negro-boy, named STEVENS, aged about 32 years, speaks but english, he walks pigeon toed, is a fine looking boy, but when he is spoken to, has a down looking face. He left with a small grey poney. A liberal reward will be paid to the person who will bring him back to the undersigned or lodge him in any jail of this State. JOHN W. HARDY. St. Landry, April 28th., 1855.--1m.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
